rows.label: qst201808_msg0001
rows.name: Hello! May I have a word?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0002
rows.name:
Is that a Cobalt Eel?! Are
you giving it to me?!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0003
rows.name: Ah, please wait, I need to talk first!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0004
rows.name:
Come on, I'll talk about anything,
just give me that Cobalt Eel!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0005
rows.name:
Don't worry, there's
plenty for everyone.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0006
rows.name: Please eat and share with your friends.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0007
rows.name: Yum! Yum! The best!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0008
rows.name: Um, so...

rows.label: qst201808_msg0009
rows.name: Ah, you had something to talk about?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0010
rows.name:
Um, a Phonex named Pepe-san
should have come to Invidia...

rows.label: qst201808_msg0011
rows.name:
If you know anything,
could you please tell me?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0012
rows.name: Ah, you mean the one from Liberalitas?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0013
rows.name: You know him?!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0014
rows.name:
To come across the sea
without regard for the
danger, that's real courage.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0015
rows.name:
A kid like him is what
you'd call a hero.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0016
rows.name: Where is Pepe-san now?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0017
rows.name:
I thought he was just talking
with his friends, but then he
said he was going to Temperantia.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0018
rows.name:
He said he was looking for strong
friends trained in harsh environments
and left with some of the young ones.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0020
rows.name: To Temperantia?!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0021
rows.name:
If I recall, there are
Superbian troops stationed
in Temperantia, correct?

rows.label: qst201808_msg0022
rows.name: Yes, that's right, but...

rows.label: qst201808_msg0023
rows.name: This is bad! This is very bad!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0024
rows.name:
If this continues, they'll
be turned into food or fur
by the Superbian army!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0025
rows.name: We have to go save them!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0026
rows.name: ...Uka, you're thinking too much.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0027
rows.name:
Don't worry, the Superbian army
will not harm the Phonexes.

rows.label: qst201808_msg0028
rows.name: You don't know that!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0029
rows.name:
We're talking about Superbia! We
can't predict what might happen!

rows.label: qst201808_msg0030
rows.name: Come on, let's go save them at once!
